coverEntrance: You'll find your game stats here. Tap to view and share.
coverShare: We can't thank you enough for making Arena of Valor what it is today! Just you share your battle stats on Facebook! Also don't forget to log in for Swag Sunday on July 29th—great rewards await you!
shareThanking: We can't thank you enough for making Arena of Valor what it is today! To show our appreciation, don't forget to log in for Swag Sunday on July 29th—great rewards await you!
flgLike: Log in to your game account to like your friend's share.
tipsNonHornor: Join the fight and you could be the next MVP!
tipsWrongArea: Can't log in. You don't have an account on this server.
tipsLag: Network delay, please close the page to try again or refresh
tipsTime: The stats for this event were taken up until 6/30/2018. There is no data for accounts registered after 6/30, but don't worry—there will be more events in future for you to look forward to!
tipsExpired: Event has ended. Please look forward to the next event.
linkText: Join me in Arena of Valor and Log in on 7/29 for a Free Hero! #SwagSunday
code-997: Event has ended. Please look forward to the next event
